{{0,0,0,271,1,{attr={agentDependencies="",agentExternalFiles="",agentName="paralife",agentUrl="Mod/Agents/paralife.xml",bx=19206,by=5,bz=19222,class="EntityAgentSign",isGlobal=true,isPhantom=false,isUseNplBlockly=true,item_id=271,updateMethod="manual",version="1.0",},name="entity",},},{1,0,0,219,15,{attr={bx=19207,by=5,bz=19222,class="EntityCode",codeLanguageType="npl",displayName="paralife.main",isPowered=true,isUseNplBlockly=true,item_id=219,},name="entity",{name="cmd","cmd("/show paralife")",},},},{2,0,0,219,14,{attr={allowGameModeEdit=false,bx=19208,by=5,bz=19222,class="EntityCode",codeLanguageType="npl",displayName="__entity_onclick",isBlocklyEditMode=false,isPowered=true,isUseNplBlockly=true,item_id=219,},name="entity",{name="cmd","registerBroadcastEvent("__entity_onclick", function(msg)
 msg = commonlib.LoadTableFromString(msg)
 local entity = GameLogic.EntityManager.GetEntity(msg.name)
 if(entity) then
 
 end
end)",},},},{1,0,-1,190,13,},{2,0,-1,219,15,{attr={allowGameModeEdit=false,bx=19208,by=5,bz=19221,class="EntityCode",codeLanguageType="npl",displayName="__entity_onhover",isBlocklyEditMode=false,isPowered=true,isUseNplBlockly=true,item_id=219,},name="entity",{name="cmd","registerBroadcastEvent("__entity_onhover", function(msg)
 msg = commonlib.LoadTableFromString(msg)
 local entity = GameLogic.EntityManager.GetEntity(msg.name)
 if(entity) then
 if(entity:HasCustomGeosets()) then
 
 end
 end
end)",},},},{2,0,-2,219,14,{attr={allowGameModeEdit=false,bx=19208,by=5,bz=19220,class="EntityCode",codeLanguageType="npl",displayName="__entity_onmount",isBlocklyEditMode=false,isPowered=true,isUseNplBlockly=true,item_id=219,},name="entity",{name="cmd","registerBroadcastEvent("__entity_onmount", function(msg)
 msg = commonlib.LoadTableFromString(msg)
 local entity = GameLogic.EntityManager.GetEntity(msg.name)
 if(entity) then
 if(msg.mountname == "" and entity:HasCustomGeosets()) then
 local mountedEntity = GameLogic.EntityManager.GetEntity(msg.mountedEntityName)
 if(mountedEntity) then
 local category = mountedEntity:GetCategory()
 if(category == "customCharItem") then
 local itemId = mountedEntity.tag
 local replacedItemId = entity:PutOnCustomCharItem(itemId)
 if(replacedItemId) then
 mountedEntity:BecomeCustomCharacterItem(replacedItemId)
 mountedEntity:SetTag(replacedItemId)
 
 local facing = entity:GetFacing()
 local x, y, z = entity:GetPosition()
 x = x + math.cos(facing)
 z = z - math.sin(facing)
 local x1, y1, z1 = mountedEntity:GetPosition()
 mountedEntity:SetPosition(x, y1, z) 
 mountedEntity:SetBootHeight(0)
 mountedEntity:SetPitch(-1.57)
 mountedEntity:FallDown()
 else
 mountedEntity:Destroy()
 end
 elseif(category == "lefthand") then
 -- TODO:
 end
 end
 end
 end
end)",},},},}
